hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_PUSH
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Flag to indicate that successful builds should be pushed to the selected docker registry

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Username for the Docker Registry Account

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_EMAIL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Email Address for the Docker Registry Account

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BCCVL_REGISTRY_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Username for the BCCVL Docker Registry (only required if different from the registry used for pushing the image or if pushing is disabled)

hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.name: BCCVL_REGISTRY_PASSWORD
hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.description: Password for the BCCVL Docker Registry (only required if different from the registry used for pushing the image or if pushing is disabled)

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set +e TAG=$(git describe --tags --exact-match) if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then HAS_TAG=true else HAS_TAG=false fi HASH=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) BRANCH_NAME=${GIT_BRANCH##origin/}
#build the system # TODO: evaluate if builds should use --no-cache #if [ $HAS_TAG = true ]; then # BUILD_ARGS=" --no-cache " #fi
if [[ $DOCKER_REGISTRY = 'hub.bccvl.org.au' ]] && [[ ! -z ${DOCKER_USERNAME+x} ]] && [[ ! -z ${DOCKER_PASSWORD+x} ]]; then if [[ -z ${DOCKER_EMAIL+x} ]]; then DOCKER_EMAIL="${DOCKER_USERNAME}@localhost" fi sudo docker login -e $DOCKER_EMAIL -u $DOCKER_USERNAME -p $DOCKER_PASSWORD $DOCKER_REGISTRY else if [[ -z ${BCCVL_REGISTRY_USERNAME+x} ]] || [[ -z ${BCCVL_REGISTRY_PASSWORD+x} ]]; then echo "No Credentials given for hub.bccvl.org.au" exit 128 fi sudo docker login -e nobody@localhost -u $BCCVL_REGISTRY_USERNAME -p $BCCVL_REGISTRY_PASSWORD hub.bccvl.org.au fi
BUILD_ARGS=" --no-cache "
sudo docker build --rm=true $BUILD_ARGS -t ${DOCKER_REGISTRY}/bccvl/postgis . exit $?

set +e TAG=$(git describe --tags --exact-match) if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then HAS_TAG=true else HAS_TAG=false fi HASH=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) BRANCH_NAME=${GIT_BRANCH##origin/}
set -e
sudo docker tag -f jenkins_visualiser ${DOCKER_REGISTRY}/bccvl/postgis:9.5.0-$HASH sudo docker tag -f jenkins_visualiser ${DOCKER_REGISTRY}/bccvl/postgis:"9.5.0-${BRANCH_NAME}-latest"
if [ $HAS_TAG = true ]; then sudo docker tag -f jenkins_visualiser ${DOCKER_REGISTRY}/bccvl/postgis:9.5.0-$TAG if [ $BRANCH_NAME = "master" ]; then sudo docker tag -f jenkins_visualiser ${DOCKER_REGISTRY}/bccvl/postgis:latest fi fi
